mapper.select: SELECT M.NAME, M.BIRTH, M.GENDER, N.PURPOSE, N.WEIGHT, N.HEIGHT, N.TARGET_WEIGHT, MT.USERID, MT.PTSTART, MT.PTEND, MT.STATUS FROM MATCHING MT JOIN MEMBERS M ON MT.USERID = M.ID JOIN NORMAL_MEM N ON M.ID = N.NORMAL_ID WHERE MT.TRAINERID = #{TRAINERID}
mapper.update: UPDATE MATCHING SET STATUS = #{STATUS}, PTSTART = SYSDATE WHERE USERID = #{USERID}
